allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "powershell -Command ""Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; $zip = [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::OpenRead\(''d:\\dev\\clemisalive\\docs\\기획\\2주_로그라이크_기획서.docx''\); $entry = $zip.GetEntry\(''word/document.xml''\); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader\($entry.Open\(\)\); $content = $reader.ReadToEnd\(\); $reader.Close\(\); $zip.Dispose\(\); $xml = [xml]$content; $ns = New-Object System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager\($xml.NameTable\); $ns.AddNamespace\(''w'', ''http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main''\); $paras = $xml.SelectNodes\(''//w:p'', $ns\); foreach\($p in $paras\){ $texts = $p.SelectNodes\(''.//w:t'', $ns\); $line = ''''; foreach\($t in $texts\){$line += $t.InnerText}; if\($line.Trim\(\)\){Write-Output $line} }""")
